pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Unified Framework for Random Forest Prediction Error Estimation // Estimates the conditional error distributions of random forest predictions and common parameters of those distributions, including conditional mean squared prediction errors, conditional biases, and conditional quantiles, by out- of-bag weighting of out-of-bag prediction errors as proposed by Lu and Hardin (2019+) arXiv:1912.07435. This package is compatible with several existing packages that implement random forests in R.
